LDA.MC.summary: Linea Directa Aseguradora, S.A. engages in the direct insurance and reinsurance business in Spain. The company offers motor, home, health, and other insurance products, as well as other activities under the LÃ­nea Directa, Aprecio, Penelope Seguros, and Vivaz Seguros brands. It distributes its product through telephone and internet sales channels. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Tres Cantos, Spain.
